import React from 'react' import './checkout.styles.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItem, selectCartPrice } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' const Checkout = ({item,total})=>{ return(
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ item.map( item => ) }
Total: {total}
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ item: selectCartItem, total: selectCartPrice }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Checkout)
